content:
The URLs didn't paste in, but here's a recap of what you'll find under subject line "[patients] Good stuff on Thursday's agenda!":

Please give a couple minutes to scan the agenda your co-chairs just drafted.  Any edits or additions??

  • Jan & Maria, see the mention of your project. Let us know if you want more or less time.

  • Virginia amplified our WG's existing calendar by adding an excellent Project Timelines calendar to our Calendars page. During the meeting she'll walk through it for us. 

    • Trust me, this is easier to watch than to sort out on your own. :) That is, of course, unless you're a Confluence guru. 
    • And we realized we'd love to have an experienced Confluence / Jira guru to answer occasional questions for us ... are you one, pretty please??  You don't have to take on an ongoing responsibility - just get us unstuck from the Atlassian mud on occasion.

  • Re the September WG meeting: Virginia and @David Pyke conspired to add a bonus session between our WG and the Consents WG.  She will discuss.

    • As you know, Consents are one of our official areas of interest, and this is a rare chance to "merge meetings" in real time.

Busy agenda ... read ahead and don't be late!
Looks like a good agenda Dave! I just wanted to note that unfortunately I will be unable to participate in tomorrow's call due to another commitment.
